My name is Nghiêm Q. Huỳnh. \
<span style="font-size:90%;">(pronounced Nee‑em Hwin)</span>

I am an Assistant Professor of Economics at the [University of Oklahoma (OU)](https://www.ou.edu/cas/economics). 

My research focuses on spatial economics,  international trade, and development economics. 

I graduated with a PhD from Yale University in 2024.  

Here’s my [CV](Huynh_Nghiem_CV.pdf){target="_blank"}.
